about_the_game:
An exciting variety of 10 new fish from your collection from Indonesia! These will appear in an in-game DLC store as well as appropriate existing stores for their species. Here’s what you’re getting!

  • Figure Eight Pufferfish

  • Annie's Goby

  • Aureofuscus Goby

  • Bala Shark

  • Red Fin Silver Shark

  • Checkered Barb

  • Dwarf Snakehead

  • Harlequin Rasbora

  • Red Laser Rainbowfish

  • Tinfoil barb

As always, all fish have had their behavior designed to match their real-life counterparts as closely as we can with our systems, but please feel free to reach out to us if you see anything funky. 

Please note: these fish will not all appear at once in your DLC store and will still be subject to random-spawning within the DLC store. The exact fish you want might not show up right away, but it shouldn’t take long!

As always, all fish have had their behavior designed to match their real-life counterparts as closely as we can with our systems, but please feel free to reach out to us if you see anything funky. 

Please note: these fish will not all appear at once in your DLC store and will still be subject to random-spawning within the DLC store. The exact fish you want might not show up right away, but it shouldn’t take long!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4430S CPU @ 2.70GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

publishers: A Shell in the Pit Games
